Reviews.Title: Great for talking and texting.
Reviews.Author: bnome91
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for a year now, and can't complain much as it is one of metro's cheapest android phones. Don't expect much from this phone.If you are looking for a phone that plays games, this phone is not for you, this phone runs really slow because of the processor it has. There are times that it will freeze up if you are running too many applications at a time.Another thing is that the battery life is really bad. If you are someone that loves to surf the internet, this phone will really drain your battery. So carry the phone charger all the time.But other than that this phone is a good touch phone, for calling and text messaging purposes only.

Reviews.Title: Not a great phone.
Reviews.Author: Quik
Reviews.Content: This was my first Android phone and I had it for about 6 months. I knew it was slow for a smart phone, but I didn't really care. It worked fine for talking, texting, playing simple games, and what-not. The only thing that bothered me was that the camera didn't have a flash.However, after about a month, problems started to appear. The phone would shut itself off randomly, freeze, have programs crash, etc. It started happening more. I took it in to be looked at and was told that there was technically nothing wrong with the device; it is just a poorly made phone in general. After those 6 months, it shut off in the middle of a text message. When I attempted to reboot the phone, it froze on the Android screen; the phone would not power on completely. I checked online forums and, apparently, this is a pretty common issue. Some people were able to reset their phone to original factory settings, but most people said they had to purchase a new phone. I brought my phone in to be looked at and despite numerous attempts to fix it, I had to purchase a new phone. Basically, if you want a phone that will last, this is not the phone to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone Available...Buy a different phone!
Reviews.Author: Gabbie
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and had it for a year...save you money and purchase a different phone. First, all of Huawei's phone's suck. this particular phone is very slow, freezes all the time, shuts off randomly,is cheaply made and breaks easily. I hate this phone and after year of having it I cant stand it any longer and I am buying a new phone. Its very slow and freezes on everything. My first week having the phone the charger and the area on phone where you connect the charger into broke. The battery is cheap and does not last long and I had to buy a new one. SAVE YOU MONEY dont buy this phone

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: D. Fitzpatrick
Reviews.Content: I don't understand what the previous reviewer is saying about this phone. I've had it for 7 months now, and I love my phone. It is fabulous. For an Android at its price point and the plan cost thru Cricket, it is a great phone.I will say theres still a learning curve. I just recently figured out that I can add my contacts (to text, or call) to the home screen. So I did, I added my most contacted. I also found I can add my Cozi caledar, and other stuff.I LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: it doesn't
Reviews.Author: j briano
Reviews.Content: it is a good phone. only problem is it doesn't stay hooked up to internet for long. Otherwise I love it. the storage space the ease of operating it.

Reviews.Title: evasive information
Reviews.Author: roberta
Reviews.Content: My phone was missing parts tha supposedly were mentioned in the comment area. Not happy to say the least. Should this be of importance to the buyer at perhaps listed in detail and description area? I am requesting to return and be refunded

Reviews.Title: Works good, decent phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Alan Toaca
Reviews.Content: not a bad phone for the money gave it to my Dad as a replacement phone and he uses it and says he likes it so I'm happy with my purchase. Not the fastest CPU in the world so if you're looking to play games/watch movies/netflix this isn't the phone for you. Good for calling people and thats about it.

Reviews.Title: Cool phone
Reviews.Author: dianette
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone, Well I used it for basic thing like calling and text but also the videos look great on it. I just wish it had a flash but pretty good phone.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Amanda Garcia
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, but was told that i couldnt use it because it was one model older then the current phone i was using

Reviews.Title: HUAWEI Ascend Metro PCS phone
Reviews.Author: Nellie
Reviews.Content: This was a huge dissapointment. The phone was not useable as it was registered under another person's name which made it impossible to activate.

Reviews.Title: Ok phone
Reviews.Author: Uly
Reviews.Content: With update phone is bearable !  Not the best phone but it does simple smartphone tasks video text games call etc

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sarah H
Reviews.Content: I havent activated it yet i use it for stuff in app store like the survey apps i made the money i spent on it back in a week so not relay affected my slow preform and mines running 2.2.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE!!!!
Reviews.Author: tastyfreeze111
Reviews.Content: I should have written this review months ago...ive had this phone for about a year and a half now..so i would say im a pretty good judge here...ive been in and out of work and i swear thats the only reason ive not gotten a new phone...that will be changing in a week and and THE VERY FIRST THING im doing is getting rid of this piece of s%$@!!!!!...It just shuts off for no apparent reason, it pulls up screens i didnt click on.., the battery life is extremely bad(unless the battery is completely full apps barely load up)BUT the worst part is the continuous freezing...the thought of me(a female) being in an emergency situation and having to make a call right then and there...i mean god forbid im being chased, in a dangerous situation or whatever....IM SCREWED!!!!!!!!....im not expecting much for the price but i am expecting standard function...I thought it was because i kept it on often..even thru the night..and it may have just needed a break..but there were times i kept if off for a day or two and the day i turned it back on....SAME SH%@!!...Im not donating this phone when i get a new one...i wouldnt wish this phone on my worst enemy!!!!!...

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: i bought this the battery is no good it dies right away and the backing just falls off i would never buy this phone again

Reviews.Title: i hate  it
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: this phone is really slow but it wasnt the phone that made me mad it was the seller. i orders 2 day shipping and it took over a week and he didnt send a charger like he said. i wouldnt reccomend the phone if your looking for something that is fast. this one  takes for ever to reply to a text when  i tap the reply button is freezes for a few seconds until it finally takes you to the typing screen.

Reviews.Title: worst thing i ever orderes from amazon
Reviews.Author: rebecca
Reviews.Content: First of all the phone was advertised as a metro pcs phone but when i received it, it turned out to be a criket phone.False advertisement. Second the phone was delivered without a phone battery or the back of the phone. i contacted seller and they said nothing was able to be done, and that i could not return it.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Ascend M860 (metro pcs)
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: The shipping came earlier than expected . The Phone was working fine for the 1st day then the next day the screen does not work . SO DISAPPOINTED . I know now not to order from this user .

Reviews.Title: got screwed
Reviews.Author: crappy phone
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone that i paid 80$ for and when i got the product which said it was in good working condition i recieved this phone that would constantly turn itself on and off again... after my experience with ordering something like this off amazon for the first time i will no longer in the future ever buy anything off this site again

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: lili
Reviews.Content: its so slow and horrible. i will never buy off here again.this is the worst phone i have had since phones were invented.

Reviews.Title: My first Android phone
Reviews.Author: JTYounk
Reviews.Content: When i saw the great price. I couldn't believe I could finally afford an Android. It was used but I scratched up worse in the last few weeks than its previous owner. looks good, works great.

Reviews.Title: This phone is CRAP!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Bmilk
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for a year now. But its my second one. Charger output jack breaks very easy. Freezes up all the time in google and apps. Keyboard sucks. Does not type what u press accurately. Handset quality for calls is HORRIBLE!!!!! Pre-loaded apps are waste of space. Does not have adobe flash fir downloads. Yeah uts fun in the beginning just cause its a smartphone. But after some months of ownership it jyst does not add up. I dont care if ut is cheaper tgan most phones, for a pjone that costs over 150$in da store the damn thing should still work. After all I dont know bout yawl, but $150 folaars is still a lot of money for something that is supposed to be in an advanced technical world and acts as crappy as this phone!!! I just read this over, the misspelled words are the acts of the phone,NOT THE USER!!!! But I decided to leave it so you can see. Really if you do get this phone,instead of The, You will get something like this Tge. It pulls the letter closest to the one ur tyrn2 use!!!!!!! I HATE THIS DAMN PHONE, ITPeople keep in mind its not Amazon it is the product!!!!! I bought this phone straight from a cricket/metro store. Its the Phone that is crap. I buy from Amazon constantly and everytime they always deliver what you order. Its not their fault this phones engineers did not.work the bugs out. But what do you expect they are ENGINEERS ALL SMARTS NO COMMEN SENSE!!! Trust me I know for a fact. I work with engineers!!!!!SUCKS!!!! Buy at your own risk!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: A.M.Hill's storefront: HUAWEI Ascend M860 is for a CRICKET SERVICE!!!
Reviews.Author: A.M.Hill "A.M.Hill"
Reviews.Content: HUAWEI Ascend M860 Metro PCS Phone with Android 2.1 OS, 3.5" Touchscreen, 3.2MP Camera and GPS - BlackI have the same phone for sale: A.M.Hill's Storefront.Im so sorry I missed typing it in, mine for sale is for a Cricket Service!Great Phone! I loved having it.

Reviews.Title: This Phone is the best android you can get for your money
Reviews.Author: Dainty
Reviews.Content: I just read that someone hated this phone, The phone I am selling does work, I have tried for my self, before putting it for sale, it does everything and more for the price, I bought a 350 phone and I am not happy with it, on this phone 411 is free, gps free, caller id is free, t.v is free . the new plan I have all of those items I listed you have to pay for seperately. I am going to let it be on sale a little while longer and if no one buys , I will be more glad to have my phone back.

Reviews.Title: huawei ascend
Reviews.Author: shaunte925
Reviews.Content: This phone was pretty descent i just wish i would have none before that it wasnt going to come with a phone memory card

Reviews.Title: Phone doesnt work!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I see why you sold it! False advertising!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Charm
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for just a minute and it sucks! The features on the phone are not working as described. I never had this problem on Amazon before, but I will not be purchasing elrctronics no more especially when they false advertise. For freakin $80 I got jipped!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
